name: Grounded (itch)
description:
You're parents grounded you and now you can't leave your room. Use your imagination and play some of your favorite videogames to find the keys and sneak out of your room!

Created for the very first Indie Tales Game Jam! Please feel free to leave any feedback and thank you so much for playing my game! I hope you enjoy it :)

Controls: (In case you missed the tutorial)

Left/Right to walk

Up to Jump

Space to interact

Shift to change game cartridge
